Row.Text: Monument to the Gods

BONUS:[ICON_Bullet]+50% [ICON_Production] Production towards [ICON_DISTRICT_WONDER] Wonders of any [ICON_Science] Era.[NEWLINE]PENALTY:[ICON_Bullet]-20% [ICON_Science] Science and [ICON_Culture] Culture in all Cities.
Inquisition

BONUS:[ICON_Bullet][ICON_Religion] Apostles can launch the Inquisition with 1 [ICON_Charges] Charge.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_Religion] Religious Units gain +15 [ICON_Religion] Religious Strength when in friendly territory.[NEWLINE]PENALTY:[ICON_Bullet]-10% [ICON_Science] Science and [ICON_Culture] Culture in all Cities.
Monasticism

BONUS:[ICON_Bullet]+33% [ICON_Science] Science in all Cities; bonus doubled in Cities with a [ICON_DISTRICT_HOLYSITE] Holy Site.[NEWLINE]PENALTY:[ICON_Bullet]-33% [ICON_Culture] Culture in all Cities.
Apathy and Tolerance

BONUS:[ICON_Bullet]+33% [ICON_Culture] Culture in all Cities; bonus doubled in Cities with a [ICON_DISTRICT_HOLYSITE] Holy Site.[NEWLINE]PENALTY:[ICON_Bullet]-33% [ICON_Science] Science in all Cities.
Isolationism

BONUS:[ICON_Bullet]+2 [ICON_Food] Food, [ICON_Production] Production, and [ICON_Gold] Gold in domestic [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes.[NEWLINE]PENALTY:[ICON_Bullet]Cannot obtain [ICON_Unit] Settlers or settle new Cities.
Unrelenting People

BONUS:[ICON_Bullet][ICON_Unit] Land Recon, Melee, Anti-Cavalry, Ranged, and Naval Melee Units gain +7 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength against [ICON_Unit] Units with more [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength.[NEWLINE]PENALTY:[ICON_Bullet][ICON_Unit] Unit Maintenance increases by 1 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
Twilight Valor
BONUS:[ICON_Bullet][ICON_Unit] Units gain +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength.[NEWLINE]PENALTY:[ICON_Bullet][ICON_Unit] Units cannot heal outside of home territory.
Pogrom

BONUS:[ICON_Bullet]+2 [ICON_Food] Food, [ICON_Science] Science, [ICON_Culture] Culture, [ICON_Production] Production, [ICON_Gold] Gold, and [ICON_Faith] Faith in all Cities.[NEWLINE]PENALTY:[ICON_Bullet]-3 [ICON_Housing] Housing in all Cities.
Peasant Communes
BONUS:[ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Food] Food and [ICON_Production] Production on [ICON_Charges] Farms.[NEWLINE]PENALTY:[ICON_Bullet]-1 [ICON_Gold] Gold on all tiles.
Violation of Casus Belli

BONUS:[ICON_Bullet][ICON_Unit] Units gain +2 [ICON_Movement] Movement and Cities gain +20% [ICON_Production] Production for 10 turns after declaring a Surprise War.[NEWLINE]PENALTY:[ICON_Bullet][ICON_Grievance] Grievances do not decay.
Noble Feuds

BONUS:[ICON_Bullet]+100% [ICON_Science] Science adjacency in [ICON_DISTRICT_CAMPUS] Campus.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+100% [ICON_Culture] Culture adjacency in [ICON_DISTRICT_THEATER] Theater Square.[NEWLINE]PENALTY:[ICON_Bullet]-15% [ICON_GreatPerson] Great People points.
Cottage Industries

BONUS:[ICON_Bullet]+3 [ICON_Housing] Housing and [ICON_Amenities] Amenities in Cities with at least 3 [ICON_District] Specialty Districts.[NEWLINE]PENALTY:[ICON_Bullet]-50% [ICON_Gold] Gold in all Cities.
Letters of Marque

BONUS:[ICON_Bullet]+50% [ICON_Production] Production towards [ICON_Unit] Naval Raider class Units.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+2 [ICON_Movement] Movement for [ICON_Unit] Naval Raider class Units.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+100% [ICON_Pillaged] Pillage rewards from [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes.[NEWLINE]PENALTY:[ICON_Bullet]-75% [ICON_Gold] Gold in [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes.
Millenialism

BONUS:[ICON_Bullet]+5 [ICON_Religion] Religious Strength for Religious Units.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Purchases with [ICON_Faith] Faith are 15% cheaper.[NEWLINE]PENALTY:[ICON_Bullet]-15% [ICON_Food] Food and [ICON_Gold] Gold in all Cities.
Samoderzhaviye

BONUS:[ICON_Bullet]+20% [ICON_Production] Production in all Cities; bonus doubled in the [ICON_Capital] Capital.[NEWLINE]PENALTY:[ICON_Bullet][ICON_Governor] Governors are neutralized and cannot be reestablished.
The Death of God
BONUS:[ICON_Bullet]+33% [ICON_Science] Science and [ICON_Culture] Culture in all Cities.[NEWLINE]PENALTY:[ICON_Bullet]-33% [ICON_Food] Growth and [ICON_Faith] Faith in all Cities.
Robber Barons

BONUS:[ICON_Bullet]+66% [ICON_Gold] Gold in Cities with a [ICON_Buildings] Stock Exchange.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+33% [ICON_Production] Production in Cities with a [ICON_Buildings] Factory.[NEWLINE]PENALTY:[ICON_Bullet]-1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenities in all Cities.
Highland Clearance

BONUS:[ICON_Bullet][ICON_Unit] The [ICON_Capital] Capital gains +66% [ICON_Food] Food, [ICON_Science] Science, [ICON_Culture] Culture, and [ICON_Gold] Gold.[NEWLINE]PENALTY:[ICON_Bullet]Cities beyond 6 tiles of the [ICON_Capital] Capital lose -33% [ICON_Gold] Gold.
Despotic Paternalism

BONUS:[ICON_Bullet]+4 [ICON_PressureUp] Loyalty in all Cities; bonus doubled in Cities with a [ICON_Governor] Governor.[NEWLINE]PENALTY:[ICON_Bullet]-10% [ICON_Science] Science and [ICON_Culture] Culture in Cities without a [ICON_Governor] Governor.
Collectivism

BONUS:[ICON_Bullet]+2 [ICON_Food] Food on [ICON_Charges] Farms.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+2 [ICON_Housing] Housing in all Cities.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+100% [ICON_Production] Production adjacency for [ICON_DISTRICT_INDUSTRIAL_ZONE] Industrial Zones.[NEWLINE]PENALTY:[ICON_Bullet]-50% [ICON_GreatPerson] Great People points.
Blitzkrieg Gamble

BONUS:[ICON_Bullet][ICON_Unit] Units gain +10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength against Cities and [ICON_District] District Defenses.[NEWLINE]PENALTY:[ICON_Bullet][ICON_Grievance] Grievances do not decay.
Banana Republic

BONUS:[ICON_Bullet][ICON_Unit]+3 [ICON_Science] Science, [ICON_Culture] Culture, and [ICON_Gold] Gold in international [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Foreign [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes give the player +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold.[NEWLINE]PENALTY:[ICON_Bullet]Foreign [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes sent to the player gain +4 [ICON_Production] Production.
Service Overseas

BONUS:[ICON_Bullet][ICON_Unit] Military Units gain +4 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength; bonus doubled on [ICON_Terrain] Continents different than the [ICON_Capital] Capital's.[NEWLINE]PENALTY:[ICON_Bullet][ICON_Unit] Unit Maintenance increases by 3 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
One Child Policy

BONUS:[ICON_Bullet]+66% [ICON_Science] Science, [ICON_Culture] Culture, [ICON_Production] Production, and [ICON_Gold] Gold in Cities with a [ICON_Citizen] Population of 15+.[NEWLINE]PENALTY:[ICON_Bullet]-66% [ICON_Food] Growth and [ICON_Faith] Faith in all Cities.
Contraceptive Revolution

BONUS:[ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity in all Cities; additional +5 [ICON_Amenities] Amenities in Cities with a [ICON_Citizen] Population of +15.[NEWLINE]PENALTY:[ICON_Bullet]-33% [ICON_Food] Growth and [ICON_Faith] Faith in all Cities; penalty doubled in Cities with a [ICON_Citizen] Population of +15.
Rogue State
BONUS:[ICON_Bullet]+50% [ICON_Production] Production towards [ICON_Nuclear] Nuclear Program and WMDs.[NEWLINE]PENALTY:[ICON_Bullet]Cannot earn influence towards [ICON_Envoy] Envoys.
Flower Power

BONUS:[ICON_Bullet]+100% [ICON_Tourism] Tourism to all players at peace when a Concert is performed.[NEWLINE]PENALTY:[ICON_Bullet][ICON_Unit] Units that are not Rock Bands cost double to [ICON_Production] Produce or [ICON_Gold] Purchase.
Cyber Warfare

BONUS:[ICON_Bullet][ICON_Unit] Units gain +10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength against [ICON_Unit] Military Units from the [ICON_Science] Information and Future Eras.[NEWLINE]PENALTY:[ICON_Bullet][ICON_Grievance] Grievances do not decay.
Automated Workforce
BONUS:[ICON_Bullet]+33% [ICON_Production] Production towards City Projects.[NEWLINE]PENALTY:[ICON_Bullet]-4 [ICON_PressureUp] Loyalty in all Cities.
Disinformation Campaign
BONUS:[ICON_Bullet]+3 [ICON_Favor] Diplomatic Favor from every [ICON_Buildings] Broadcast Center.[NEWLINE]PENALTY:[ICON_Bullet]-10% [ICON_Science] Science and [ICON_Culture] Culture in all Cities.
Autonomous States
BONUS:[ICON_Bullet]+12 [ICON_Favor] Diplomatic Favor per turn.[NEWLINE]PENALTY:[ICON_Bullet]-4 [ICON_PressureUp] Loyalty in all Cities.
